mapper.update: update aoyo_coupon set coupon_total_count= coupon_total_count-1,coupon_status_id=2 where coupon_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into aoyo_custom_coupon (custom_id, create_time, delete_flag,coupon_id,coupon_status_id) values (#{customId},now(),1,#{id},1)
mapper.select: select cc.coupon_status_id couponStatusId,c.coupon_desc couponDesc,c.coupon_name couponName,c.coupon_end_time couponEndTime,c.coupon_type_id couponTypeId,c.coupon_amt couponAmt,c.coupon_minimum_amount couponMinimumAmount from aoyo_custom_coupon cc,aoyo_coupon c where cc.coupon_id=c.coupon_id and cc.coupon_status_id=#{id}
